description: This file defines a React-like component called ProjectsSection that renders a section displaying project cards. It imports JSON data for projects and UI components (Card and Section) to compose the UI. The component maps over an array of project data to generate individual project cards with images, titles, descriptions, technologies, and links.

methods.name: ProjectsSection
methods.description: A Qwik component that renders a projects section with project cards based on local JSON data.
